heading: Disposition
text:
The department or agency having custody of the vehicle and tools, after judicial determination of
   forfeiture, shall, at its discretion, either (i) retain such vehicle and tools for the official use of the city; or (ii) by p ublic notice of at
   least five days, sell such forfeited vehicle and tools at public sale. The net proceeds of any such sale shall be paid into the general
   fund of the city.
